name: id-playground
title: ID Playground
description: Generate and validate common identifiers such as IMEI, ICCID, MSISDN, UUID, IBAN and MAC address. Detect your IP address.
author: tobiasp

commands.name: generate-ids
commands.title: Generate Identifiers...
commands.description: Generate IPs, IMEIs, MAC, MSISDN, UUID, and ICCID.

commands.name: validate-ids
commands.title: Validate Identifiers...
commands.description: Validate IMEI, IBAN, ICCID, and UUID.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
